content.raw:
In addition to the demo `roslaunch wave_gazebo wave_wamv.launch ` for testing the buoy models, I would recommend taking a look at this demo: `roslaunch wave_gazebo ocean_world_buoys.launch`

If you look in the comments for [PR 114](#!/osrf/vrx/pull-requests/114/wave-visual-physics-refactor/diff) you can see how I used this, along with a model  generation script, to evaluate the change in computational resources required.  I think it would be good to do a few test cases, comparing the current default with this branch, to make sure that we have similar computation requirements.
content.html:
In addition to the demo roslaunch wave_gazebo wave_wamv.launch for testing the buoy models, I would recommend taking a look at this demo: roslaunch wave_gazebo ocean_world_buoys.launch

If you look in the comments for PR 114 you can see how I used this, along with a model generation script, to evaluate the change in computational resources required. I think it would be good to do a few test cases, comparing the current default with this branch, to make sure that we have similar computation requirements.
